wikipedia_page.main: Kevin Michael Hannon (born 4 May 1980) is an English former footballer who played in the Football League for Wrexham.

response: Eventually, Kroger and his team won indictments against seven men, including Ken Rice and Kevin Hannon, Enron's top two broadband executives. They pleaded guilty in 2004 and became government witnesses, helping to secure fraud convictions against Enron chairman Kenneth Lay and CEO Jeffrey Skilling.
